info.title: ParkAPI Service
info.description: This is the OpenAPI documentation for the ParkAPI service.

errorResponse.description: A generic error response supporting general and validation errors.

_debug.description: additional debug information if application debug is true

_debug_cause.description: additional debug cause information if application debug is true

id.description: Internal ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

created_at.description: Creation date in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

modified_at.description: Last modified value in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

source_id.description: Source ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

parking_site_id.description: ParkingSite ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

geojson.description: GeoJSON geometry. Additional attribute is `coordinates` containing coordinates depending on `type`.

restricted_to.description:
*Deprecated, use restrictions instead.*
Restrictions which apply. If there are multiple options, they should be understood with an logical or.

restrictions.description: Restrictions which apply. If there are multiple options, they should be understood with an logical or.

has_realtime_data.description: Whether the parking spot has realtime data or not.

static_data_updated_at.description: Last time static fields were updated. Can be set by the client.

realtime_data_updated_at.description: Last time realtime fields were updated. Can be set by the client.

parking_spot_id.description: ParkingSpot ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

type.description: If type is not set, all audiences are restricted.

max_stay.description: Maximum stay period, based on ISO 8601 duration format.

source_id.description: Source ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

public_url.description: URL for human users to get more details about this parking site.

address.description: Full address including street postalcode and city. Preferable in format {street with number}, {postalcode} {city}

description.description: Description for customers like special conditions, remarks how to get there etc.

type.description: ON_STREET, OFF_STREET_PARKING_GROUND, UNDERGROUND and CAR_PARK are used at car parks, WALL_LOOPS, STANDS, LOCKERS, SHED, TWO_TIER, BUILDING are used at bike parks, and OTHER at both.

max_stay.description:
*Deprecated, use restrictions.max_stay instead.*
Maximum stay, in seconds.

related_location.description: A related location like a school.

static_data_updated_at.description: Last time static fields were updated. Can be set by the client.

realtime_data_updated_at.description: Last time realtime fields were updated. Can be set by the client.

realtime_opening_status.description: Realtime opening status which is reported by the client.

geojson.description: GeoJSON geometry. Additional attribute is `coordinates` containing coordinates dependingon `typ`.

restricted_to.description:
*Deprecated, use restrictions instead.*
Restrictions which apply. If there are multiple options, they should be understood with an logical or.

restrictions.description: Restrictions which apply. If there are multiple options, they should be understood with an logical or.

id.description: Internal ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

created_at.description: Creation date in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

modified_at.description: Last modified value in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

parking_site_id.description: ParkingSite ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

type.description: If type is not set, all audiences are restricted.

max_stay.description: Maximum stay period, based on ISO 8601 duration format.

id.description: Internal ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

created_at.description: Creation date in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

modified_at.description: Last modified value in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

id.description: Internal ID, generated by ParkAPI Service.

created_at.description: Creation date in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

modified_at.description: Last modified value in ParkAPI Service database, cannot be set by clients.

static_data_updated_at.description: Last time static fields were updated. Can be set by the client.

get.description: Get Datex2 Parking Sites as JSON.

parkingPublicationLight.description: A simplified publication to transfer parking information.

items.description: A collection of parking spaces within a building, an open ground or some on street area. Usually seen as one entity and manged as such.
An assignment for a parking site or a parking space. Might be including or excluding, depending on typeOfAssignment.

additionalAssignment.description: An additional assignment in natural language.

availableSpaces.description: The total number of currently vacant parking spaces within this site for the given assignment. (e.g. for lorries). Use only with type of assignment = "optimised" or "allowed". Do not use when describing a single parking space.

fuelType.description: The type of fuel this assignment refers to.

typeOfAssignment.description: Defines, if this assignment is of including or excluding nature.

user.description: A user this assignment refers to.

vehicleType.description: The vehicle type this assignment refers to.

coordinatesForDisplay.description: A pair of planar coordinates defining the geodetic position of a single point using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

dimension.description: A component that provides dimension information. The product of width and height must not be necessarily be the square footage (e.g. in multi-storey buildings or when some zones are not part of the square footage).

orientationOfLengthAxis.description: The orientation of the length axis in degree. In the case of a parking space, this corresponds to the direction, in which a vehicle is parked.

usableArea.description: The area measured in square metres, that is available for some specific purpose.

level.description: The level of the parking space (0 = ground etc.), or the first level of the entire parking site (for example, if a parking site is located on the roof of a building).

locationDescriptor.description: Supplementary human-readable description of the location

roadNumber.description: The road number designated by the road authority

specificAccessInformation.description: Information on one specific access (entrance or exit) in human readable text, for example the corresponding road where it is located.

availableSpaces.description: The total number of currently vacant parking spaces available in the specified parking site.

description.description: A description for this parking site.

equipmentAndServices.description: Equipment and services available at this parking site, described in natural language.

freeParking.description: If true, parking is free at this site.

isOpenNow.description: True, if the parking site is open right now.

lastUpdate.description: Last update time of this parking site information.

maximumParkingDuration.description: The maximum parking duration in seconds for this parking site.

numberOfSpaces.description: The total number of parking spaces at this site, not including closed spaces (due to maintenance, for example).

occupancyTrend.description: The trend of the occupancy of the parking spaces in the specified parking site.

openingTimesDescription.description: Opening times of this parking site, described in natural language.

operatorInformation.description: Information about the operator of this parking site.

security.description: Security aspects at this parking site, described in natural language.

tariffDescription.description: Information about the parking-tariffs in natural language.

temporaryClosed.description: True, if the parking site is closed ignoring its regular opening times, for example due to maintenance or constructions.

urlLinkAddress.description: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address pointing to a resource available on the Internet from where further relevant information may be obtained.

zoneDescription.description: A description of some specific zone this parking site might belong to.

items.description: A parking space, i.e. a single slot for one vehicle. Includes dynamic information if it is available or not.
An assignment for a parking site or a parking space. Might be including or excluding, depending on typeOfAssignment.

additionalAssignment.description: An additional assignment in natural language.

availableSpaces.description: The total number of currently vacant parking spaces within this site for the given assignment. (e.g. for lorries). Use only with type of assignment = "optimised" or "allowed". Do not use when describing a single parking space.

fuelType.description: The type of fuel this assignment refers to.

typeOfAssignment.description: Defines, if this assignment is of including or excluding nature.

user.description: A user this assignment refers to.

vehicleType.description: The vehicle type this assignment refers to.

coordinatesForDisplay.description: A pair of planar coordinates defining the geodetic position of a single point using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

dimension.description: A component that provides dimension information. The product of width and height must not be necessarily be the square footage (e.g. in multi-storey buildings or when some zones are not part of the square footage).

orientationOfLengthAxis.description: The orientation of the length axis in degree. In the case of a parking space, this corresponds to the direction, in which a vehicle is parked.

usableArea.description: The area measured in square metres, that is available for some specific purpose.

level.description: The level of the parking space (0 = ground etc.), or the first level of the entire parking site (for example, if a parking site is located on the roof of a building).

locationDescriptor.description: Supplementary human-readable description of the location

roadNumber.description: The road number designated by the road authority

specificAccessInformation.description: Information on one specific access (entrance or exit) in human readable text, for example the corresponding road where it is located.

accessibility.description: Information on accessibility, easements and marking for handicapped people.

availability.description: Information if this space is closed, available or occupied.

externalIdentifier.description: An external identfier for this parking space, e.g. "R145"

lastUpdate.description: Point of time of the latest update of this information.

maximumParkingDuration.description: The maximum parking duration in seconds for this parking space.

nextAvailableTimeSlot.description: In case there is a reservation or time management: Point of time this space will be available for usage.

description.description: A description for the parking light publication.

name.description: The name of the parking light publication.

cities.description: An object with Names as key and source uids ans value.

items.description: A parking site / parking lot is an area with multiple parking places.

forecast.description: If the data source offers a forecast. Is not available at this service and documented just for compatibility reasons.

total.description: Capacity including all used sparking spots and without longterm parking spots.

fee_hours.description: In OSM opening_hours format. Is not available at this service and documented just for compatibility reasons.

address.description: Contains a full address with street, house number, postcode and address

coordinates.description: First value is lon, second value is lat

get.description: Get Parking Spots. This endpoint is paginated, which means that you can set a limit and iterate over pages. To maintain consistency at all situations, especially if datasets get deleted, we decided to do cursor pagination instead of offset pagination.

Get Parking Sites. This endpoint is paginated, which means that you can set a limit and iterate over pages. To maintain consistency at all situations, especially if datasets get deleted, we decided to do cursor pagination instead of offset pagination.

parameters.name: ignore_duplicates
parameters.description: Defaults to true. If set to false, you will get ParkingSites flagged as duplicates, too.
